insights.title: Foundations for Mathematical Reality
insights.author: Arithmoi Foundation
insights.summary: An exploration of mathematics as the fundamental structure of reality, introducing group theory and the elegant foundations that underlie number theory, symmetry, and the mathematical nature of existence.

insights.title: Ontological Mathematics and Eastern Philosophy
insights.author: Arithmoi Foundation
insights.summary: The seers and philosophers of old have long known the power of numbers.

insights.title: Pondering on the God Equation
insights.author: Arithmoi Foundation
insights.summary: An exploration of Euler's formula as the fundamental equation of existence, examining how this elegant mathematical relationship encodes the logic of reality itself through ontological mathematics.

insights.title: The Alchemy of Symmetry and Anti-Symmetry
insights.author: Arithmoi Foundation
insights.summary: An exploration of the fundamental duality between symmetry and anti-symmetry in mathematics, from basic number theory to quantum mechanics and the divine structure of reality.

insights.title: The Bridge of Thought
insights.author: Arithmoi Foundation
insights.summary: There is a way to understand the universe thanks to mathematics.

insights.title: The Mathematical and Medical Alliance
insights.author: Arithmoi Foundation
insights.summary: The medical and mathematical fields can grow together.

insights.title: The Power of Mathematics and Numbers
insights.author: Arithmoi Foundation
insights.summary: The power of numbers can be unlocked with the right mindset and approach.

foundations.title: Bell's Theorem and the Mathematical Universe
foundations.author: Arithmoi Foundation
foundations.summary: A comprehensive exploration of Bell's Theorem, demonstrating the conflict between local realism and quantum mechanics, with mathematical foundations and philosophical implications for the nature of reality.

foundations.title: Essential Calculus Theorems
foundations.author: Arithmoi Foundation
foundations.summary: Calculus theorems are essential to a strong mathematical education.

foundations.title: Real and Complex Mathematical Analysis
foundations.author: Arithmoi Foundation
foundations.summary: A comprehensive guide to real and complex mathematical analysis, covering foundations, sequences, series, continuity, differentiation, integration, and complex function theory.

foundations.title: Prime Numbers as a Way to Sublime Mathematics
foundations.author: Arithmoi Foundation
foundations.summary: An introduction to prime numbers allowing readers to develop a strong intuition of the mathematical objects.

explorations.title: A Novel U(3) Group and Applications

explorations.summary: An article discussing a novel U(3) group and its applications to quantum computing and other fields.

explorations.summary: An article on an imaginary derivation of e and related concepts.

explorations.summary: An article on asymptotic light geometry and its relations.

explorations.summary: An article on the derivation of the complex unit sphere.

explorations.title: Geometric Thoughts with Guest Algebra
explorations.author: Jason Glowney
explorations.summary: An article on geometric thoughts with guest algebra.

explorations.title: Gravitational Wave Signal Processing
explorations.author: Jason Glowney
explorations.summary: An article on gravitational wave signal processing.

explorations.title: Imaginary Angles and the Connection Between
explorations.author: Jason Glowney
explorations.summary: An article on imaginary angles and the connection between related concepts.

explorations.summary: An article on Lie groups and Lie algebras.
